amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: The department shall administer the Private Postsecondary Career School Act and for the purposes thereof shall employ such personnel as may be necessary. To effectuate the purposes of the act, the department may request from any department, division, board, bureau, commission, or other agency of the state, and the same shall provide, such information as will enable the department to exercise properly its powers and perform its duties under the act.
